pr_title: Support using Device Connection cache client with Quarkus adapters

timeline.bodyText: Was that intended to be kept here? If so, maybe put some more context info in the log output?
timeline.author: calohmn

replies.bodyText: I have removed the log statements
replies.author: sophokles73

timeline.message:
Support using Device Connection cache client with Quarkus adapters

The Quarkus based adapters now also support connecting to a remote cache
containing Device Connection data directly using the Infinispan Hotrod
client.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>
